Operations¶

Implementations for all accounts related heavy operations.

accounts.operations.create_new_registered_user(username, form_data, reg_method, set_passwd=True)¶

Method to create a new registered user in the system.

Note

This method is one complete atomic process except for accounts.models.UserProfile since it is mongoDb collection.

Parameters:
  • username – Valid username of form <country_tel_code>-<mobile-no>
  • form_data – Dictionary with all relevant data
  • reg_method – Registration method as per accounts.models.RegisteredUser.CH_REG_METHOD
  • set_passwd – If True, sets password as in form_data and tranit reg_user to verification pending state. Ignores if False.
Returns:

Newly created accounts.models.RegisteredUser instance

Authors: Gagandeep Singh
